description:
The three Origami sisters start living alone togehter. Times are tough, and they`re having trouble scraping together the money they need to eat. The sisters start going to school at Goryoukan Academy, and Mana is excited to make friends with them. Akara doesn`t seem to like the additional attention she`s getting from everyone, and ends up getting in a fight with Amane, the leader from a team she accidentally took out instead of Altair Torte. Just what will happen...?
Source: crunchyroll
